title: After so much years, how is this still a thing?
body:
https://i.imgur.com/hCvZT7b.png[/img]

I've been sitting for about 5 minutes now, waiting for a 30 seconds max update to finally say "well, I guess its over now". This has been a problem ever since the implantation of the new client and this applies as well to the patch cycle once the launcher is started. If I need to wait an extra 15 minutes every single minor patch, might as well indicate I need to wait that long and stop making me lose my time because its too hard to make a representative loading bar
